sentences.en: A hum of shrill voices reverberated against the low ceiling.
sentences.cn: 低矮的天花板下回响着尖细嗓音的嗡嗡声.

sentences.en: Before he knew it, the heat and hum of the forest had lulled him to sleep.
sentences.cn: 森林里的热气和嗡嗡的声音让他不知不觉便睡着了。

sentences.en: He began to hum a tune.
Ho hum, another nice job down the drain.
Hum, I am sorry but I thought you were French.
sentences.cn: 嗯，很抱歉，我以为你是法国人。

sentences.en: Machines hummed on the factory floor.
sentences.cn: 机器在车间里嗡嗡作响。

sentences.en: My general reaction to this news might be summed up as "ho-hum"
sentences.cn: 我对这条消息的总体反应可以用“哼儿哈儿”来概括。

sentences.en: She heard the hum of voices in the house.
sentences.cn: 她听见了屋子里的嘈杂声.

sentences.en: The music is generally terrific but the scripting and acting are a bit ho-hum.
sentences.cn: 音乐总体来说很棒，但编剧和表演就有点平淡无奇。

sentences.en: The new manager soon made things hum.
sentences.cn: 这位新经理不久便使一切都活跃起来了.

sentences.en: The place is really beginning to hum.
sentences.cn: 这个地方真正开始热闹起来了。

sentences.en: The question - posed with dramatic rhetoric - produced a hum of approval from spectators.
sentences.cn: 问题的提出富于戏剧性和修辞美,引起了一阵赞许的嗡嗡声.

sentences.en: There was a general hum of conversation around them.
sentences.cn: 他们周围的人都在嗡嗡地低声交谈。

sentences.en: Um - hum [ Uh - huh , Yes ] , I see.
We hear the hum of conversation from the next room.
sentences.cn: 我们听到隔壁房间嗡嗡的谈话声.

sentences.en: Within the lounge the peaceful hum of conversation stopped.
sentences.cn: 酒吧间里轻声低语的谈话声中止了.

words.tran_cn: 发嗡嗡声的；精力旺盛的
蜂鸟；蜂鸣器，发嗡嗡声的东西

trans.tran_cn: 嗡嗡声，杂音，哼唱的动作

trans.tran_en: to sing a tune by making a continuous sound with your lips closed
to make a low continuous sound

trans.tran_cn: 忙碌，活跃，发嗡嗡声，发出嘈杂声
trans.tran_en: to sing a tune by making a continuous sound with your lips closed
to sing a tune by making a continuous sound with your lips closed
